# camunda-8-connector-zip



[Description](data:image/png;base64,data:image/png;base64,)

Connector to execute ZIP and UNZIP operation

Different functions available: Zip,Unzip


## Zip
Zip a list of documents to one document.

![ZipFiles.png](doc/ZipFiles.png)

### Inputs
| Name                             | Description              | Class             | Level    |
|----------------------------------|--------------------------|-------------------|----------|
| listSourceFile                   | List Source files        | java.util.List    | REQUIRED |
| encoding                         | Encoding (Chartset       | java.lang.String  | OPTIONAL |
| stopAtFirstError                 | Stop at first error      | java.lang.Boolean | OPTIONAL |
| zipFileName                      | Zip File Name            | java.lang.String  | REQUIRED |
| destinationJsonStorageDefinition | JSon Storage Destination | java.util.Map     | OPTIONAL |



### Outputs
| Name    | Description               | Class            | Level    |
|---------|---------------------------|------------------|----------|
| zipFile | Destination variable name | java.lang.String | REQUIRED |



### Errors
| Name                          | Explanation                                   |
|-------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| INCORRECTSTORAGEDEFINITION    | Definition to access the storage is incorrect |
| WRITE_FILE                    | A file to the storage failed                  |
| READ_FILE                     | Read the file failed                          |
| RAR_COMPRESSION_NOT_SUPPORTED | The Rar compression is proprietary            |



## Unzip
Unzip a document, and create a list of documents.

![UnZipFiles.png](doc/UnZipFiles.png)

### Inputs
| Name                             | Description                       | Class            | Level    |
|----------------------------------|-----------------------------------|------------------|----------|
| sourceFile                       | Source file to unzip              | java.lang.String | REQUIRED |
| sortZipEntries                   | Sort the list of files in the zip | java.lang.String | REQUIRED |
| filterFile                       | Filter file                       | java.lang.String | OPTIONAL |
| filterPath                       | Filter Path                       | java.lang.String | OPTIONAL |
| destinationJsonStorageDefinition | JSon Storage Destination          | java.util.Map    | OPTIONAL |



### Outputs
| Name            | Description                | Class            | Level    |
|-----------------|----------------------------|------------------|----------|
| listDocumentsId | List of documents unzipped | java.lang.String | REQUIRED |



### Errors
| Name                | Explanation                                       |
|---------------------|---------------------------------------------------|
| FOLDER_CREATION     | Error during the creation of one object           |
| INVALID_PARENT      | Can't retrieve the parent                         |
| READ_FILE           | Read the file failed                              |
| INVALID_COMPRESSION | Impossible to detect the compression (RAR or ZIP) |




# Development

## Start locally the connector

Execute the class [LocalConnectorRuntime.java](src/test/java/io/camunda/zip/LocalConnectorRuntime.java). 
It starts a local connector, using the [application.yaml](src/test/resources/application.yaml) file to connect to the Zeebe server.


## Generate Element Template
Execute the class [ElementTemplateGenerator.java](src/test/java/io/camunda/csv/ElementTemplateGenerator.java) to generate the Element template.

The connector uses the Cherry generator to create a rich element template. 

## Generate documentation
Execute the class [DocumentationGenerator.java](src/test/java/io/camunda/csv/DocumentationGenerator.java) to generate the documentation to describe each function.

The connector uses the Cherry principle to create this documentation.
